identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a RAG interface that feels like a 'Living Archive'—tactile, precise, and authoritative. Reject the 'Purple/Dark Mode' AI cliché.
principles: Fusion: Swiss Brutalism x Botanical Archive
Content is King: Typography over decoration
Contrast: Sharp black/white with organic textures

heading.usage: Main page titles, hero sections, major modal headers. Adds 'Editorial Authority'.

body.usage: General UI, chat messages, form inputs.

mono.usage: Citations, code blocks, timestamps, metadata, document IDs.

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + tracking-widest (0.2em) + text-xs.
Line height: Tight (1.1) for headings, Relaxed (1.6) for reading content.

colors.dark_mode_strategy: The Darkroom. Deep charcoal (#121212) background, not pure black. Text is off-white (#E0E0E0). Accents remain Burnt Orange.
colors.gradients: FORBIDDEN. Use solid colors and textures only.

radius.note: Strict Swiss Brutalism. No rounded corners unless it's a pill badge.

textures.noise: Add a subtle SVG noise overlay to the main background to simulate paper grain.
textures.borders: Use 1px solid borders for separation. No soft drop shadows for layout.

grid_system.dashboard: Mode B: The Control Room (Dense, 100% height usage)

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 where others use p-4.
spacing.containers: Borders must have internal padding (p-6) to prevent text collision.

sidebar.style: Fixed, border-r border-border. High contrast in dark mode.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:translate-x-[-2px] hover:translate-y-[-2px] hover:shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] transition-all border border-black

inputs.style: rounded-none border-input bg-transparent focus:ring-0 focus:border-primary border-b-2 border-t-0 border-x-0 px-0

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons lift up and cast a hard shadow on hover.
motion.page_load: Staggered fade-in with slight upward drift (10px).

empty_state_docs.description: Abstract paper layers for empty document lists.

processing_state.description: Geometric concrete shapes for processing/loading states.

login_bg.description: Minimalist white abstract for login page background.

media.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/playfair-display', '@fontsource/inter', and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the 'Organic & Earthy' color palette and '0px' border radius.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Modify ui/button.jsx and ui/input.jsx to match the 'Sharp Brutalist' style defined in components section.
4. LAYOUT: Build the main RAG interface using a Resizable Panel layout (Sidebar | Chat | Document Viewer).
5. CITATIONS: Display citations as 'Footnotes' style cards at the bottom of AI responses, using JetBrains Mono.
6. NOISE TEXTURE: Create a global CSS class '.bg-noise' and apply it to the body.
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No purple gradients, no rounded 'bubble' chats.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through z-index and hard borders, not soft shadows.
